instruction: Can you animate this SVG file? I want the bunny to blink its eyes wiggle its nose.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the bunny to look to the left and face the front again.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the arrows to hit the target with a satisfying thud.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the target to light up in concentric circles as if the arrow hit the bullseye.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the buildings to rise from the ground in a lively manner. The window lights should appear after the buildings rise.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the sky to change from day to night, and the building lights to turn on to bright yellow gradually as the sky gets darker.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the bird to flap its wings gently while blinking its eyes.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the bird to falp its wings and tail to gently jump upwards and back down.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that logo pops up in a lively manner with the orange part appearing first and then the blue circle appearing.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the orange logo to spin in 3D once and then settle down.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that the elements smoothly pop up in a lively manner, starting from the bottom elements and moving up to the top elements.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the rainbow to appear in a clip-path effect, revealing counter-clock wise, and then the clouds to float gently from left to right.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the tree to grow lively manner, first the trunk rushing in and then the leaves bouncing in.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the leaves to sway gently as if blown by a soft breeze.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that icons pop up in a lively manner. The math symbols should appear one by one with a bounce in effect.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the buttons to bounce in one by one as if someone is pressing them.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the camel to blink its eye twice once in a while.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the camel's toungue to stick out playfully and then retract back, while the camel blinks its eye.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the lightning bolt to blink twice and the diagonal line to appear in a stroke effect, as if it is being drawn.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the flash sign to stay still and the diagonal line to blink twice.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that the scene pops up in a lively manner. Objects should appear one by one from back to front.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the clouds to float gently from left to right and the tree to sway gently as if blown by a soft breeze.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the hexagon to appear with a fade in effect, and then the X sign to enter by spinning and fading in.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the entire SVG to bounce in from the top left.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the two characters to smoothly switch places. Both arrows appear in a stroke effect as this translation happens.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want a loading animation where the characters enter the scene with a fade-in effect one by one.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that the tree pops up in a lively manner. The glass ornaments should bloom into the trees and the star on top should appear last with a twinkling effect.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the star and the glass ornaments to shine softly as if they are twinkling.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the elements to pop up in a lively manner, starting from the bottom elements and moving up to the top elements. The moon should rise slowly behind the clouds.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the snowflakes to blink softly and the moon glow softly.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the lightning bolt to flash twice and the raindrops to fall gently one by one.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the lightning bolt to glow softly and the raindrops to fade in and out gently.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that the keyboard pops up in a lively manner. The keyboard cable should appear last with a clip-path.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the keys to light up one by one as if someone is typing a message.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that the compas pops up in a lively manner. The needle should appear last with a clip-path effect.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the compass needle to quickly spin around twice and then settle while wobbling.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the face to look at the right and then back to the left, while the lips follow naturally.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the sunglass to shine with a glossy effect as the face slightly tilts up and down.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the circle to appear first with a clip-path, as if it is being drawn, and then the check mark to be drawn in a clip-path.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the entire SVG to lively and quickly flip twice in 3D y-axis, as if it is a coin.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the star burst effect to appear with a soft zoom in effect as the magic wand appears in a fade-in effect.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the start burst effect to change colors in a loop while the magic wand gently bounces up and down.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the two currency symbols to smoothly switch places. Both arrows appear in a clip-path as this exchange happens.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want a loading animation where the currency symbols enter the scene with a fade-in effect one by one, clock-wise.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the elements to pop up in a lively manner, starting from the bottom elements and moving up to the top elements.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the clouds to flow gently from left to right and also subtly changes colors to different shades of gray.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening effect for the doughnut, the bread first popping up, and then the glaze appearing in a fade-in effect, and sprinkles falling in last.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the doughnut sprinkles to twinkle softly as if they are sugary crystals.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the eyes to blink twice the mouth to bob up and down.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the earth to spin slowly once and then settle.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the face to blink its eyes twice and mouth to very slightly scale up and down.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the eyes and mouth to move as if they are laughing heartily, with the eyes and mouth moving in sync.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the face to laugh as the mouth slightly opens wider.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the coin to flip in 3D y-axis quickly twice and then interted into the piggy bank.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG. The piggy bank should bounce-in first and then the coin should bounce-in up from the piggy bank

Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the whole SVG, so that logo pops up in a gentle manner with the purple globe appearing first and then the fox fading in while wrapping around the globe.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the purple globe in the center to change colors in similar shades of purple and pink as it pulses. Everything else should stay still.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the flames to flicker gently as if blown by a soft breeze, the fires swaying in sync.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the fish to flap its fins and blink its eyes as it bobs up and down gently.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the stars and planets first to emerge gently and then the rings to appear in a stroke effect.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want the stars and planets to twinkle lively once in a while and the rings stay still.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the slider to softly go down to the end of the bar, and the level bars turn off as the slider goes down.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the different colored boxes to slightly bob up and down as if they are floating. The timing should be slightly differ to give it a more staggering feel, but the boxes should not overlap or become too far apart.
Can you animate this SVG file? I want an opening animation for the sun, so that the sun rises slowly from behind the buildings and the sun rays fade in once the sun has settled into its place.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the hand to rub its chin thoughtfully while the mouth follows naturally.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the newton's cradle to swing. The left-most ball should swing down first, followed by the right-most ball swinging up as the left-most ball reaches the bottom. The process should repeat in the opposite direction as well.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the tree to blow in the wind.

Can you animate this SVG file? I want the individual leaves (the leaf petals) to fall gently from the tree, changing to an autumn color (but in a similar tone as the original green) before they begin to fall. The leaves should gently sway and fade as they fall. The leafy part of the tree (the canopy) should also change to an autumn color (again to a similar tone of the canopy) before the leaves begin to fall.
